full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

*   **Procurement Reference Number:**
    PW-FK-280-81364
*   **Amendment Number:**
    1
*   **Solicitation Number:**
    EJ196-202422/A
*   **Publication Date:**
    August 25, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:**
    October 19, 2022 @ 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:**
    September 30, 2022
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:**
    Not Applicable
*   **Expected Contract End Date:**
    Not Applicable
*   **Tender Status:**
    Expired

## Official Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement

## Delivery Location

This tender will be conducted for the National Capital Region (NCR).
